name: fis-postpackager-seajs2
description: a postpackager plugin for fis to create sea-config.js
readme:
# fis-postpackager-seajs2

a postpackager plugin for fis to create sea-config.js.

## usage

    $ npm install -g fis-postpackager-seajs
    $ vi path/to/project/fis-conf.js

```javascript
//file : path/to/project/fis-conf.js
fis.config.set('modules.postpackager', 'seajs');
```
